drinks.name: Dwarven Ale
drinks.description: A refreshing pint of ale. Perfect to cool down after a hot day in the forge

drinks.name: Elven Wine
drinks.description: A bottle of exquisite wine from ancient vineyards. Best served chilled.

drinks.name: Orcish Stout
drinks.description: A dark, hearty stout favored by the orc warriors. Not for the faint of heart.

drinks.name: Goblin Grog
drinks.description: A cheap and nasty concoction brewed by goblins. Drink at your own risk!

drinks.name: Wizard's Mead
drinks.description: A magical mead that is said to enhance one's intellect and spellcasting abilities.
